trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when there is an invalid attempt to access a private or protected field inside a class.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取類別內部私用或受保護欄位而無效時，所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This exception is typically thrown when the access level of a field in a class library is changed, and one or more assemblies referencing the library have not been recompiled.
trans-unit.target: 類別庫中某個欄位的存取層級已變更，以及一或多個組件參考文件庫尚未重新編譯時，通常會擲回這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.FieldAccessException> uses the HRESULT COR_E_FIELDACCESS, which has the value 0x80131507.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.FieldAccessException> 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_FIELDACCESS，0x80131507 的值。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.FieldAccessException>, see the <xref:System.FieldAccessException.%23ctor%2A> constructors.
trans-unit.target: 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單<xref:System.FieldAccessException>，請參閱<xref:System.FieldAccessException.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: This exception is not included in the [.NET for Windows Store apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) or the , but it is thrown by some members that are.
trans-unit.target: 這個例外狀況不會包含在[適用於 Windows 市集應用程式](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912)或，但它的某些成員所擲回。

trans-unit.source: To catch the exception in that case, write a `catch` statement for <xref:System.MemberAccessException> instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要在此情況下攔截例外狀況，請撰寫`catch`陳述式<xref:System.MemberAccessException>改為。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.FieldAccessException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.FieldAccessException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.FieldAccessException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.FieldAccessException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Attempted to access a field that is not accessible by the caller."
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息描述錯誤，例如 「 嘗試存取不能由呼叫端存取的欄位。 」

trans-unit.source: This message takes the current system culture into account.
trans-unit.target: 此訊息會考量目前系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.FieldAccessException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.FieldAccessException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.FieldAccessException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.FieldAccessException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance by using the `message` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性使用的新執行個體`message`參數。

trans-unit.source: The content of `message` is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: `message` 的內容必須能讓人了解。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor must ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已針對目前系統的文化特性當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.FieldAccessException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.FieldAccessException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 存放序列物件資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.FieldAccessException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化資料，初始化 <see cref="T:System.FieldAccessException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object that was transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 重新構成透過資料流傳送的例外狀況物件的還原序列化期間呼叫這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>inner</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>inner</c> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外狀況的 <see langword="catch" /> 區塊中引發。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.FieldAccessException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.FieldAccessException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or returns `null` if it does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性會傳回相同的值傳遞至建構函式，或傳回`null`如果沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor must ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已針對目前系統的文化特性當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.FieldAccessException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.FieldAccessException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 內部例外狀況參考。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。
